Villa have made two changes from the starting eleven that kicked off the victory against Tottenham Hotspur a week ago, with Emi Buendía getting the nod ahead of Evann Guessand and Ollie Watkins retaining his spot up [...] The post Aston Villa team news as Unai Emery makes TWO changes for Premier League clash against Manchester City appeared first on AVillaFan.com – Aston Villa Fan Site.

arts.ttl: Manchester City and Villa have confirmed their starting lineups.
arts.sum: Manchester City and Aston Villa have confirmed their starting lineups ahead of today’s Premier League clash at Villa Park. For Manchester City, Rodri and Abdukodir Khusanov will miss today’s match due to injury as per Pep Guardiola’s update on the status of his squad that arrived on Friday.
